long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,:
Twitter Export Followers-Following allows you to quickly extract and export your followers, verified followers and following from any account as a CSV file with one click. 

üèÜ Advantage
The Twitter Export Followers-Following extension's most significant advantage over others is its ability to intelligently adjust the time intervals between extractions to avoid the common issue of encountering 'Too Many Requests' errors due to Twitter's rate limits, which can lead to minimal data extraction.

üë®üèª‚Äçüíª Features
‚úì Extract and export Followers from Twitter to CSV
‚úì Extract and export Verified Followers from Twitter to CSV
‚úì Extract and export Following from Twitter to CSV
‚úì Extract user profile, including user_id, name, user_name, bio, created_at, can_dm, tweets_count, followers_count, following_count, favourites_count, media_count, location, profile_url, avatar_url, profile_banner_url, verified, is_blue_verified.

üìÉ How to Start Exporting?
- Enter the Twitter username or open the extension on the Twitter user‚Äôs profile, and the extension will automatically fill in the username.
- Select Export Type: Followers, Verified Followers or Following.
- Click the Start Exporting Button.

üì¨ Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

üìÉ Terms
Each time, you are entitled to export up to 150 data entries for free. To export more, you need to upgrade to Pro.

üîí Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

‚ÑπÔ∏è Statement
Twitter is a trademark of Twitter, LLC. Twitter Export Followers-Following is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to Twitter, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,zh_CN:
Twitter Export Followers-Following allows you to quickly extract and export your followers, verified followers and following from any account as a CSV file with one click. 

üèÜ Advantage
Our extension can export more data, as we comply with Twitter's rate limits.

üü¢ indicates the normal time interval for requests
üü† indicates the cooldown period's time interval
üî¥ indicates the time interval for request errors

üë®üèª‚Äçüíª Features
‚úì Extract and export Followers from Twitter to CSV
‚úì Extract and export Verified Followers from Twitter to CSV
‚úì Extract and export Following from Twitter to CSV
‚úì Extract user profile, including user_id, name, user_name, bio, created_at, can_dm, tweets_count, followers_count, following_count, favourites_count, media_count, location, profile_url, avatar_url, profile_banner_url, verified, is_blue_verified.

üìÉ How to Start Exporting?
- Enter the Twitter username or open the extension on the Twitter user‚Äôs profile, and the extension will automatically fill in the username.
- Select Export Type: Followers, Verified Followers or Following.
- Click the Start Exporting Button.

‚ö†Ô∏è Caution
To avoid being flagged by Twitter's risk control for frequent data exports, we suggest creating a dedicated Twitter account for exporting data.

üì¨ Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

üìÉ Terms
Each time, you are entitled to export up to 150 data entries for free. To export more, you need to upgrade to Pro.

üîí Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

‚ÑπÔ∏è Statement
Twitter is a trademark of Twitter, LLC. Twitter Export Followers-Following is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to Twitter, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.

long.pt_BR,pt_PT:
A extens√£o Twitter Export Followers-Following possibilita a r√°pida extra√ß√£o e exporta√ß√£o dos seus seguidores, seguidores autenticados e perfis seguidos de qualquer conta para um arquivo CSV com apenas um clique.

üèÜ Vantagem
O diferencial desta extens√£o em rela√ß√£o √†s outras √© a capacidade de ajustar inteligentemente os intervalos de tempo entre as extra√ß√µes para evitar o erro comum 'Muitas Solicita√ß√µes', causado pelos limites de acesso do Twitter, o que possibilita maximizar a coleta de dados.

üë®üèª‚Äçüíª Funcionalidades
‚úì Exportar seguidores do Twitter para um arquivo CSV
‚úì Exportar seguidores autenticados do Twitter para um arquivo CSV
‚úì Exportar perfis seguidos do Twitter para um arquivo CSV
‚úì Exportar informa√ß√µes do perfil do usu√°rio, incluindo user_id, nome, nome de usu√°rio, biografia, data de cria√ß√£o, possibilidade de enviar mensagens diretas, contagem de tweets, n√∫mero de seguidores, n√∫mero de perfis seguidos, n√∫mero de favoritos, contagem de m√≠dia, localiza√ß√£o, URL do perfil, URL do avatar, URL do banner do perfil, se verificado e se tem o selo azul de verifica√ß√£o.

üìÉ Como come√ßar a exporta√ß√£o?
- Insira o nome de usu√°rio do Twitter ou abra a extens√£o na p√°gina de perfil do usu√°rio do Twitter, e a extens√£o preencher√° o nome de usu√°rio automaticamente.
- Escolha o tipo de exporta√ß√£o desejado: seguidores, seguidores autenticados ou perfis seguidos.
- Clique no bot√£o 'Iniciar Exporta√ß√£o'.

üì¨ Contato
Se tiver qualquer d√∫vida ou sugest√£o para aprimorar a extens√£o, n√£o hesite em entrar em contato conosco atrav√©s do e-mail jfl913@gmail.com.

üìÉ Termos
Voc√™ tem o direito de exportar at√© 150 registros de dados gratuitamente cada vez. Para exportar uma quantidade maior, √© necess√°rio atualizar para a vers√£o Pro.

üîí Privacidade dos Dados
Todos os dados processados permanecem no computador do usu√°rio e n√£o s√£o transmitidos pelos nossos servidores.

‚ÑπÔ∏è Declara√ß√£o
O Twitter √© uma marca registrada da Twitter, LLC. A extens√£o Twitter Export Followers-Following n√£o est√° afiliada, endossada ou patrocinada pelo Twitter, Inc. ou por qualquer uma de suas empresas afiliadas ou subsidi√°rias.
